{"step_by_step_thinking": "Mass Drug Administration (MDA) is a strategy used to control or eliminate several diseases by offering treatment to entire populations without individual diagnosis. According to the documents, MDA has been used for diseases such as malaria, lymphatic filariasis, and worm infestations. However, there is no mention of MDA being used for Vitamin A Deficiency.", "answer_choice": "B. Vitamin A Deficiency"}
